title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 07 August 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (07/08/2008 07:41): XWiki.Cop was modified by XWiki.Cop (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Cop  
xwikibot - (07/08/2008 08:32): XWiki.LiSuci was modified by XWiki.LiSuci (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/LiSuci  
asyd - (07/08/2008 11:24): \\_o<  
BBurns - (07/08/2008 14:54): guys, is the wysiwyg editor hard coded? or is it a page, template somewhere that can be edited? I want to insert images so that the document name is included in the code  
xwikibot - (07/08/2008 14:55): XWiki.XWikiCommittersGroup was modified by xwiki:XWiki.jvdrean - http://sandbox.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiCommittersGroup  
arpit\_jain - (07/08/2008 15:40): I just upgraded my system and when i run Xwiki, it gives me this error http://tinypaste.com/bb690  Any idea why is this coming ?  
BBurns - (07/08/2008 15:42): did you set it up yoourself or are you using the package?  
BBurns - (07/08/2008 15:43): (arpit\_jain)  did you use the standalone or custom installation?  
arpit\_jain - (07/08/2008 15:43): I set it up myself .. But it was working fine just before i upgraded few packages/kernel on my system   
arpit\_jain - (07/08/2008 15:43): I checked it out from the repo and working on it   
BBurns - (07/08/2008 15:45): i'm no expert, sorry, I was just asking because I had vaguely similar error myself after upgrading because I forgot to put my database driver jar in my container after an upgrade  
arpit\_jain - (07/08/2008 15:46): after xwiki upgrade or system upgrade ?  
BBurns - (07/08/2008 15:46):  it was an xwiki upgrade, seems like Ican't help  
arpit\_jain - (07/08/2008 15:47): Thanks Anyway  
BBurns - (07/08/2008 16:04): jvdrean: is there somewhere I can modify how the WYSIWYG editor defines the code for an imported image? I want to specifically specify the document name which shouldn't be too hard if I could just find where to do it  
jvdrean - (07/08/2008 16:06): the code for an imported page ?  
jvdrean - (07/08/2008 16:06): image ?  
jvdrean - (07/08/2008 16:07): you'd like to attach all the images to a single document ?  
BBurns - (07/08/2008 16:08): jvdrean: you know when you the WYSIWYG editor and you insert an image, the wiki mark up"{image:VRT.PNG}" is put into the page  
BBurns - (07/08/2008 16:09): well I want it to instead put {image:VRT.PNG | document=Main.Austria)  
BBurns - (07/08/2008 16:09): (jvdrean) when I am inserting an image called VRT.PNG into a document called Austria in the space Main  
jvdrean - (07/08/2008 16:12): BBurns: you should have a look at xwiki/tiny\_mce/themes/wikieditor  
BBurns - (07/08/2008 16:15): yes, that is where I have been looking at, I  have identified the file which attaches the file, I just can't identify the insert file  
lucaa - (07/08/2008 17:17): hi xwikiers. Has anyone seen this before and could give me a hint about the source of it? http://pastebin.com/m64954502   
xwikibot - (07/08/2008 19:02): GoogleSummerOfCode.WebDAVApi2008 was modified by xwiki:XWiki.asiri - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/GoogleSummerOfCode/WebDAVApi2008
